requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

results.name: A Portrait of your Dinner as a Glazed Ham
